org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity
Interface IAeVariableContainer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeAnonymousVariableContainer, AeVariablesImpl, AeWSBPELFaultHandler
public interface IAeVariableContainer

Provides method for adding a variable to an impl. Added to support special variables on non-scope activities like the catch that defines/declares a variable.

Method Summary
 void addVariable(IAeVariable aVariable)
          Adds the variable
 IAeVariable findVariable(java.lang.String aVariableName)
          Gets the variable by its name
 IAeBpelObject getParent()
          Gets the parent of the variables container
 void initialize()
          Initializes the variables in the container
 java.util.Iterator iterator()
          Gets an iterator over the IAeVariables within this container
